Eththawashen ratata aadare nam bola.. vilpattu kapaddi ubalata thibba uwamanawa saha kepaweema ai me lankawata kunu container genapu ekata wirudhdhawa wachanayak wath katha karanna beri... ubalata dhannethi unata apita dhannwa..  rishad nethuwa sinhala ekek vilpattuwa kapala thibbanam ubala kata puka wahagena paaduwe idi.. kunu container eka dammika perera nethuwa muslim ekek genalla thibbanam ubalage lokkonge loku kam saha rate gena thyna kekkuma balaganna thibba... me rate weradi karana eka newei prashna.. a weradi kawda karanne kiyala thama prashne thynne.. just 20lakhs inna muslims ta ubalage loku scene pennala wedak neh.. weradi kaarayage aagama jaathiya balannethuwa ubalage sinhala kama pennala me mawbima rekaganilla.. boruwata muslim ekek monawa hari karahama thama mawbima gena kekkumak jaathiya gena kekkumak ubalata bihi wenne.. ubala bn ane mandaa
@Hit Idea kohma neethi aawoth kamak neh.. ape aagama neethiya anuwa thama apita jeewath wenna thynne.. nethuwa eka ekaah kiyana paliyata neethi wenaskam krla jeewath wenna uwamanawak netha..

@Hit Idea 
kunuharupen baninna tharam mata oluwa amaruwak neh... ubata dhen mkd prashne kiyapan math uththara dhennam

@Hit Idea 
Ane palayan bn yanna islam aagama kana pita kiyawagena apita ugannanna enna epa.. ubalage logic eken ekak kiyannam. Budu hamuduru ipadunu rata india wa nam lankawa kohmad boudhdha rata wenne
